docs.snippet: To the delight of grandfathers and dorky librarians everywhere, the fuddy-duddy sweater vest has shed its uncool reputation. In several standout collections for this coming spring season, designers subverted the sleeveless knit with puckish attitu...

headline.main: Sweater Vests Are Back. Just Don’t Tell Grandpa.

docs.snippet: A social media star, the former labor secretary extends his critique of big money’s influence on politics with a new documentary, “Saving Capitalism.”

headline.print_headline: An Attack Dog on Many Platforms, Robert Reich Now Comes to Netflix
headline.main: Robert Reich, a Multiplatform Gadfly, Comes to Netflix

docs.snippet: As major companies chase India’s new internet users, Google is changing core products to work better on low-end smartphones and use less data.

headline.print_headline: Google Missed Out in China;  Can It Flourish Now in India?
headline.main: Google Missed Out on China. Can It Flourish in India?

docs.snippet: Jaron Lanier’s house and his new book, “Dawn of the New Everything,” are both crammed full of strange and mesmerizing stuff.

headline.main: Soothsayer in the Hills Sees Silicon Valley’s Sinister Side

docs.snippet: The onetime gatekeeper of China’s internet, who purged China’s social media of its most beloved personalities, has been detained and is under investigation.

headline.main: China’s Flashy Ex-Internet Censor Faces Corruption Investigation

docs.snippet: You don’t need a recipe, unless you’d like one, and you can have a hearty meal on the table in less than an hour.
For a special holiday dinner, go beyond coq au vin, with rich duck and earthy lentils instead of the usual chicken and potatoes.

headline.print_headline: Deep Flavor for the Depths of Winter
headline.main: Duck and Lentils: Deep Flavor for the Depths of Winter

docs.snippet: The federal government waits too long to bar guns from violent homes.
For a fast, satisfying meal you can prepare from pantry staples, try this Italian dish made by poaching eggs in a spicy sauce.

headline.print_headline: Oh! What Fresh Morsel Is This?
headline.main: Eggs, Tomatoes and a Quick Trip to Purgatory

docs.snippet: The 26 who died in the shooting at the First Baptist Church included long-married couples and several children.

headline.print_headline: The Lives Cut Short in a Texas Church
headline.main: The Lives Cut Short in a Texas Church
